description:
• Learn How To Build An Audience And Get Your Book Selling Quickly
  • Start Profiting From Your Book
  • Learn How To Leverage Social And Digital Marketing Techniques

In this course you will learn about the various platforms and methods you can use to promote your book. The reasons why your book isn't selling and how you can make adjustments to improve sales. I will teach you the industry techniques that we use to commence and increase sales.

We will start you off by explaining how to find your audience online. You know your demographic inside out, but now you need to know how to find them and get them excited about your book.

Once you have completed this computer based training course, you will understand the tools we use and how to use them effectively to start seeing a return on the time and money you have invested into publishing your book.

PS. The $49 dollars is the introductory price while we polish off a few of the additional lectures. So if you want to make sure you get in at this special price, sign up now. You won't regret it (but if you wait, you might).
title: Book Marketing: Promote Your Book
